system.descriptionText: If Comrade equipped with Indirect Weapon to launch a flare and squad in place where Artillery Barrage Possible, Character makes +0 Command Test instead of BS Test for an attack action. 1d5+5 Rounds Later, -1 per DoS (min 1 Round), an Artillery Strike lands at position of launched flare. Profile (3d10+10 X, Pen 16, Blast 2d10+5, Concussive(3)). Comrade must be out of Cohesion. Can't make another attack during turn making the order.
